newsitem.title: USA: Urohealth to not meet 1997 earnings views.
newsitem.headline: Urohealth to not meet 1997 earnings views.

text.p: Urohealth Systems Inc said on Wednesday it will not meet analysts' earnings estimates for the fiscal year ended March 31, 1997.

According to First Call, the consensus estimate is for Urohealth, a developer of non-invasive medical and laboratary products, to earn $0.47 a share in fiscal 1997, compared to a loss of $0.78 a share in fiscal 1996.
The company said that based on discussions with its auditors, it will recognize in fiscal 1998 revenues of $18 million for products shipped during 1997.
